eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.economy

Class WauzShop

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.economy.WauzShop

  • public class WauzShop
extends java.lang.Object
    A shop, generated from a shop config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzShopItem, ShopMenu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isGlobal
      If the shop is global (gamemode independent).

      All the items the shop offers.

      private java.lang.String shopName
      The name of the shop.
